Name: Coptic textile
Description: A fragment of woollen textile. There are two leaf shaped motifs, confronted, with animals between in red on yellow background with an indigo stripe. Technique: tapestry with built up shapes, curved weft, slits and dove-tailing. The fine decoration is in 'soumak'.Ends per inch (warp threads): 28.Picks per inch (weft threads): 128 approximately.
